Class PlayerJoy

                  metrobotics.PlayerJoy
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class PlayerJoy
extends javax.swing.JPanel

Author:
Pablo Mu–oz - Metrobotics This class displays the arrows and textfields to send movement commands to the server, Player or directly to the robots. TODO: I disabled sending commands to Player and directly to the Robot. This needs to be enabled and test it Pablo.
